statements: SELECT * FROM location_marketing_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, location FROM location_marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_id, effectiveness FROM location_marketing_campaigns WHERE effectiveness > 0.75;
SELECT location, start_date, end_date FROM location_marketing_campaigns WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM location_marketing_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC, end_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM location_marketing_campaigns WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, location FROM location_marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, location, start_date, end_date FROM location_marketing_campaigns WHERE effectiveness > 0.8 ORDER BY location ASC, start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM location_marketing_campaigns WHERE location = 'London' AND start_date BETWEEN '2022-06-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT campaign_name, location, start_date, end_date FROM location_marketing_campaigns WHERE effectiveness < 0.5 ORDER BY effectiveness DESC, start_date ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Campaigns WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, impressions, clicks FROM CampaignStats WHERE location_id = 5;
SELECT campaign_id, engagement_rate, impressions, clicks, conversions FROM CampaignStats WHERE clicks > 100 AND conversions < 10;
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(impressions) AS total_impressions FROM CampaignStats GROUP BY campaign_id;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM Campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM CampaignStats WHERE impressions > 1000 ORDER BY clicks DESC
SELECT campaign_id, location_id, engagement_rate FROM CampaignStats WHERE clicks >= 50 AND conversions >= 5
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 3
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(clicks) AS total_clicks, SUM(conversions) AS total_conversions FROM CampaignStats GROUP BY campaign_id HAVING total_clicks > 500
SELECT * FROM Campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns WHERE budget > 1000;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, budget FROM Campaigns ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT location_name, city, state, country FROM Locations WHERE city='New York';
SELECT result_id, campaign_id, location_id, revenue_generated FROM MarketingResults WHERE conversion_rate >= 0.5;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM Campaigns WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, location_name, city, state, country FROM Campaigns c JOIN Locations l ON c.location_id = l.location_id WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT campaign_id, location_id, conversion_rate, revenue_generated FROM MarketingResults WHERE revenue_generated > 1000 ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM Locations WHERE country = 'USA' AND state = 'California' ORDER BY location_name ASC;

SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget, city, conversion_rate FROM Campaigns c JOIN Locations l ON c.location_id = l.location_id JOIN MarketingResults m ON c.campaign_id = m.campaign_id WHERE budget >= 5000 AND conversion_rate >= 0.5 ORDER BY budget DESC, conversion_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM Campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns;
SELECT location_id, city FROM Locations WHERE state = 'New York';
SELECT customer_id, location_id, timestamp, interaction_type FROM CustomerInteractions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, location_name, interactions_count, conversion_rate FROM CampaignAnalytics WHERE interactions_count > 100 ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM Campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT location_name, city, state FROM Locations WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, timestamp FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT campaign_id, location_id, interactions_count, conversion_rate FROM CampaignAnalytics WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM location_data;
SELECT location_name, interaction_count FROM location_data WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_data WHERE phone_number LIKE '+1%';
SELECT interaction_time, interaction_id FROM interaction_data ORDER BY interaction_time DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaign_data WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, campaign_id, location_name, interaction_count FROM location_data;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaign_data ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customer_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT MAX(interaction_time) AS latest_interaction FROM interaction_data;
SELECT campaign_name, interaction_type FROM campaign_data JOIN campaign_interaction ON campaign_data.id = campaign_interaction.campaign_id;
